mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_TBL (QNA_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId})
INSERT INTO QNA_FILE_TBL (QNA_FILE_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_RENAME, FILE_PATH, QNA_NO) VALUES (SEQ_QNA_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{fileName}, #{fileRename}, #{filePath}, #{qnaNo})
